trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the HTML specification, the <i> element was merely a presentational element used to display text in italics, much like the <b> element was used to display text in bold letters. This is no longer true, as these tags now define semantics rather than typographic appearance. A browser will typically still display the contents of the <i> element in italic type, but is, by definition, no longer required to.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML规范的早期版本中， <i> 元素只是用于以斜体显示文本的表示性元素，就像 <b> 元素用于以粗体字母显示文本一样。这不再是正确的，因为这些标记现在定义了语义而不是印刷外观。浏览器通常仍将以斜体显​​示<i>元素的内容，但根据定义，不再需要。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the HTML specification, the <i> element was merely a presentational element used to display text in italics, much like the <b> element was used to display text in bold letters. This is no longer true, as these tags now define semantics rather than typographic appearance. A browser will typically still display the contents of the <i> element in italic type, but is, by definition, no longer required to do so. To display text in italic type, authors should use the CSS font-style property.
trans-unit.target: 在HTML规范的早期版本中， <i> 元素只是用于以斜体显示文本的表示性元素，就像 <b> 元素用于以粗体字母显示文本一样。这不再是正确的，因为这些标记现在定义了语义而不是印刷外观。浏览器通常仍将以斜体显示 <i> 元素的内容，但是根据定义，不再需要这样做。要以斜体显示文本，作者应使用CSS font-style 属性。

trans-unit.source: In either case, the date/time and time zone values would be submitted to the server as separate data points, and then you'd need to store them appropriately in the database on the server-side.
trans-unit.target: 无论哪种情况,日期/时间和时区值都会作为单独的数据点提交给服务器,然后你需要在服务器端的数据库中适当地存储它们。

trans-unit.source: In general, browsers will attempt to map this to <img>, but only if the src attribute is specified as well. Creating an <image> element without a src attribute results in an HTMLElement object with the local element name "image". However, if the element is created with a src attribute, the result is instead an HTMLImageElement and its local element name is changed to "img".
trans-unit.target: 通常，浏览器将尝试将此映射到 <img> ，但 src 是还必须指定src属性。创建没有 src 属性的 <image> 元素会导致 HTMLElement 对象的本地元素名称为 "image" 。但是，如果使用 src 属性创建元素，则结果是 HTMLImageElement ，其本地元素名称更改为 "img" 。

trans-unit.source: In languages with grammatical number (that is, languages where the number of items affects the grammar of a sentence), use the same grammatical number in your title attribute as inside your <abbr> element. This is especially important in languages with more than two numbers, such as Arabic, but is also relevant in English.
trans-unit.target: 在具有语法编号的语言（即，项数影响句子语法的语言）中，在 title 属性中使用与 <abbr> 元素内部相同的语法编号。这在具有两个以上数字的语言（例如阿拉伯语）中尤其重要，但在英语中也与此相关。

trans-unit.source: In many servers, dates are stored as numbers instead of as strings--numbers of a fixed size and agnostic of format (aside from endianness). After the year 10,000, those numbers will just be a little bit bigger than before, so many servers will not see issues with forms submitted after the year 10,000.
trans-unit.target: 在许多服务器中,日期被存储为数字而不是字符串--固定大小和不可知格式的数字(除了endianness)。在1万年之后,这些数字会比以前大一点,所以很多服务器在1万年之后提交的表格不会出现问题。

trans-unit.source: In older browsers that don't support the async attribute, parser-inserted scripts block the parser; script-inserted scripts execute asynchronously in IE and WebKit, but synchronously in Opera and pre-4 Firefox. In Firefox 4, the async DOM property defaults to true for script-created scripts, so the default behaviour matches the behaviour of IE and WebKit.
trans-unit.target: 在不支持 async 属性的旧版浏览器中，插入解析器的脚本会阻止解析器；插入脚本的脚本在IE和WebKit中异步执行，但在Opera和4之前的Firefox中同步执行。在Firefox 4中，对于脚本创建的脚本， async DOM属性默认为 true ，因此默认行为与IE和WebKit的行为匹配。

trans-unit.source: In order to create dynamic content and Web applications, HTML supports the use of scripting languages, most prominently JavaScript. Certain elements support this capability.
trans-unit.target: 为了创建动态内容和Web应用程序,HTML支持使用脚本语言,最突出的是JavaScript。某些元素支持这种功能。

trans-unit.source: In order to provide autocompletion, user-agents might require <input>/<select>/<textarea> elements to:
trans-unit.target: 为了提供自动完成功能，用户代理可能需要 <input> / <select> / <textarea> 元素来：

trans-unit.source: In order to represent a color in CSS, you have to find a way to translate the analog concept of "color" into a digital form that a computer can use. This is typically done by breaking down the color into components, such as how much of each of a set of primary colors to mix together, or how bright to make the color. As such, there are several ways you can describe color in CSS.
trans-unit.target: 为了在CSS中表示一种颜色,你必须找到一种方法将 "颜色 "的模拟概念转化为计算机可以使用的数字形式。这通常是通过将颜色分解成组件来实现的,比如一组原色中每一种颜色的多少混合在一起,或者使颜色的亮度达到多少。因此,在CSS中,有几种方法可以描述颜色。

trans-unit.source: In order to simplify the basic format used for date strings in HTML, the specification requires that all years be given using the modern (or proleptic) Gregorian calendar. While user interfaces may allow entry of dates using other calendars, the underlying value always uses the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 为了简化HTML中用于日期字符串的基本格式，该规范要求使用现代（或多事）公历来给所有年份。尽管用户界面可能允许使用其他日历输入日期，但是基础值始终使用公历。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <hgroup> element prevents any of its secondary <h1>–<h6> children from creating separate sections of their own in the outline—as those <h1>–<h6> elements otherwise normally would if they were not children of any <hgroup>.
trans-unit.target: 换句话说， <hgroup> 元素可防止其任何第二个 <h1>–<h6> 子级在大纲中创建自己的单独部分，就像那些 <h1>–<h6> 元素否则通常不会创建这些部分一样。任何 <hgroup> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: In short, this configures the server to allow graphic files (those with the extensions ".bmp", ".cur", ".gif", ".ico", ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".png", ".svg", ".svgz", and ".webp") to be accessed cross-origin from anywhere on the internet.
trans-unit.target: 简而言之,这将服务器配置为允许从互联网上的任何地方跨源访问图形文件(那些扩展名为".bmp"、".cur"、".gif"、".ico"、".jpg"、".jpeg"、".png"、".svg"、".svgz "和".webp "的文件)。

trans-unit.target: 在某些浏览器（例如Chrome 70.0）中，如果没有 muted 属性，则自动播放将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, search engines covering specific regions may provide locally-specific extensions of microdata. For example, Yandex, a major search engine in Russia, supports microformats such as hCard (company contact information), hRecipe (food recipe), hReview (market reviews) and hProduct (product data) and provides its own format for the definition of the terms and encyclopedic articles. This extension was made to solve transliteration problems between the Cyrillic and Latin alphabets. Due to the implementation of additional marking parameters of Schema's vocabulary, the indexation of information in Russian-language web-pages became considerably more successful.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，覆盖特定区域的搜索引擎可能会提供微数据的本地特定扩展。例如，俄罗斯主要的搜索引擎Yandex支持微格式，例如hCard（公司联系信息），hRecipe（食品食谱），hReview（市场评论）和hProduct（产品数据），并提供了自己的格式来定义术语和百科全书。进行此扩展是为了解决西里尔字母和拉丁字母之间的音译问题。由于实施了Schema词汇表的附加标记参数，俄语网页中的信息索引变得相当成功。

trans-unit.source: In the above examples, you may have noticed that you can select a radio button by clicking on its associated <label> element, as well as on the radio button itself. This is a really useful feature of HTML form labels that makes it easier for users to click the option they want, especially on small-screen devices like smartphones.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，您可能已经注意到，可以通过单击与其关联的 <label> 元素以及单选按钮本身来选择一个单选按钮。这是HTML表单标签的一项非常有用的功能，它使用户可以更轻松地单击所需的选项，尤其是在智能手机等小屏幕设备上。

trans-unit.source: In the above examples, you may have noticed that you can toggle a checkbox by clicking on its associated <label> element as well as on the checkbox itself. This is a really useful feature of HTML form labels that makes it easier to click the option you want, especially on small-screen devices like smartphones.
trans-unit.target: 在以上示例中，您可能已经注意到，可以通过单击与其关联的 <label> 元素以及复选框本身来切换复选框。这是HTML表单标签的一项非常有用的功能，它使单击所需选项更加容易，尤其是在智能手机等小屏幕设备上。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a same named group of checkbox input types, only the checkboxes with the required attribute are required.

trans-unit.source: In the case of a same named group of radio buttons, if a single radio button in the group has the required attribute, a radio button in that group must be checked, although it doesn't have to be the one with the attribute is applied. So to improve code maintenance, it is recommended to either include the required attribute in every same-named radio button in the group, or else in none.
trans-unit.target: 对于相同名称的单选按钮组，如果该组中的单个单选按钮具有 required 属性，则必须选中该组中的单选按钮，尽管不一定要应用具有该属性的单选按钮。 。因此，为了改善代码维护，建议在组中的每个同名单选按钮中都包含 required 属性，否则就不包含任何必需的属性。

trans-unit.source: In the first lines of script, we get references to the form input itself, and the <div> element with the class of .preview. Next, we hide the <input> element — we do this because file inputs tend to be ugly, difficult to style, and inconsistent in their design across browsers. You can activate the input element by clicking its <label>, so it is better to visually hide the input and style the label like a button, so the user will know to interact with it if they want to upload files.
trans-unit.target: 在脚本的第一行中，我们获得对表单输入本身的引用，以及具有 .preview 类的 <div> 元素的引用。接下来，我们隐藏 <input> 元素-之所以这样做，是因为文件输入在各种浏览器中往往很丑陋，难以设置样式且设计不一致。您可以通过单击 input 元素的 <label> 来激活输入元素，因此最好以视觉方式隐藏 input 并像按钮一样设置标签样式，以便用户上载文件时知道与之交互。

trans-unit.source: In the old days of the web, pages were typically written in two versions: One for Netscape Navigator, and one for Microsoft Internet Explorer. When the web standards were made at W3C, browsers could not just start using them, as doing so would break most existing sites on the web. Browsers therefore introduced two modes to treat new standards compliant sites differently from old legacy sites.
trans-unit.target: 在过去的网络时代,网页通常有两个版本。一个是Netscape Navigator,一个是Microsoft Internet Explorer。当W3C制定网络标准时,浏览器不能随便开始使用这些标准,因为这样做会破坏网络上现有的大多数网站。因此,浏览器引入了两种模式,以区别对待符合新标准的网站和旧的传统网站。

trans-unit.source: In the same manner as <link> elements, <style> elements can include media attributes that contain media queries, allowing you to selectively apply internal stylesheets to your document depending on media features such as viewport width.
trans-unit.target: 以与 <link> 元素相同的方式， <style> 元素可以包含包含媒体查询的 media 属性，从而允许您根据媒体功能（例如视口宽度）有选择地将内部样式表应用于文档。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the browser may replace the image with the text in the element's alt attribute. For these reasons and others, provide a useful value for alt whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，浏览器可以用元素的 alt 属性中的文本替换图像。由于这些原因及其他原因，请尽可能提供 alt 的有用价值。

trans-unit.source: In this example we create two sets of UI elements for choosing dates: a native <input type="date"> picker and a set of three <select> elements for choosing dates in older browsers that don't support the native input.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们创建了两组用于选择日期的UI元素：一个本机 <input type="date"> 选择器，以及一组三个 <select> 元素，用于在不支持本机输入的旧版浏览器中选择日期。

trans-unit.source: In this example we create two sets of UI elements for choosing datetimes — a native <input type="datetime-local"> picker, and a set of five <select> elements for choosing dates and times in older browsers that don't support the native input.

trans-unit.source: In this example we create two sets of UI elements for choosing weeks: a native picker created using <input type="week">, and a set of two <select> elements for choosing weeks/years in older browsers that don't support the week input type.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们创建了两组用于选择星期的UI元素：使用 <input type="week"> 创建的本机选择器，以及一组两个 <select> 元素，用于在不支持的旧版浏览器中选择星期/年在 week 的输入类型。

trans-unit.source: In this example we include a srcset attribute containing a reference to a high-resolution version of the logo; this will be loaded instead of the src image on high-resolution devices. trans-unit.source: In this example we include a srcset attribute with a reference to a high-resolution version of the logo; this will be loaded instead of the src image on high-resolution devices. The image referenced in the src attribute is counted as a 1x candidate in user agents that support srcset.

trans-unit.source: In this example you will see that we've given each checkbox the same name (note the brackets at the end of the name, which allows the values to be sent as an array). If both checkboxes are checked and then the form is submitted, you'll get a string of name/value pairs submitted like this: interest[]=coding&interest[]=music. When this data reaches the server-side, you should be able to capture it as an array of related values and deal with it appropriately — see Handle Multiple Checkboxes with a Single Serverside Variable, for example.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，您将看到我们为每个复选框指定了相同的 name （请注意名称末尾的方括号，该括号允许将值作为数组发送）。如果同时选中了两个复选框，然后提交了表单，您将获得一串名称/值对，其提交如下： interest[]=coding&interest[]=music 。当这些数据到达服务器端时，您应该能够将其捕获为一组相关值并进行适当处理 -例如，请参阅使用单个服务器端变量处理多个复选框。

trans-unit.source: In this example you will see that we've given each checkbox the same name. If both checkboxes are checked and then the form is submitted, you'll get a string of name/value pairs submitted like this: interest=coding&interest=music. When this string reaches the server, you need to parse it other than as an associative array, so all values, not only the last value, of interest are captured. For one technique used with PHP, see Handle Multiple Checkboxes with a Single Serverside Variable, for example.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，您将看到我们为每个复选框指定了相同的 name 。如果同时选中了两个复选框，然后提交了表单，您将获得一串名称/值对，其提交方式如下： interest=coding&interest=music 。当此字符串到达​​服务器时，除了将其作为关联数组之外，还需要对其进行解析，因此将捕获所有 interest 值，而不仅仅是最后一个值。有关与PHP一起使用的一种技术，请参见例如，使用单个服务器端变量处理多个复选框。

trans-unit.source: In this example you will see that we've given each checkbox the same name. When this string reaches the server, you need to parse it other than as an associative array, so all values, not only the last value, of interest are captured. For one technique used with PHP, see Handle Multiple Checkboxes with a Single Serverside Variable, for example.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，您将看到我们为每个复选框指定了相同的 name 。如果同时选中了两个复选框，然后提交了表单，您将获得一串名称/值对，其提交方式如下： interest=coding&interest=music 。当此字符串到达​​服务器时，除了将其作为关联数组之外，还需要对其进行解析，因此将捕获所有 interest 值，而不仅仅是最后一个值。有关与PHP一起使用的一种技术，请参见例如，使用单个服务器端变量处理多个复选框。

trans-unit.source: In this example, two <source> elements are included within the <picture>, providing versions of an image to use when the available space exceeds certain widths. If the available width is less than the smaller of these widths, the user agent will fall back to the image given by the <img> element.

trans-unit.source: In this example, we create 2 sets of UI elements for choosing dates: a native <input type="date"> picker and a set of 3 <select> elements for older browsers that don't support the native date input.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们创建了两组用于选择日期的UI元素：一个本机 <input type="date"> 选择器，以及一组3个 <select> 元素，用于不支持本机日期输入的旧版浏览器。

trans-unit.source: In this example, we create two sets of UI elements, each designed to let the user select a month and year. trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们创建了两组UI元素，每组UI元素旨在让用户选择月份和年份。第一个是本机 month 输入，另一个是一对 <select> 元素，它们允许独立选择月份和年份，以与尚不支持 <input type="month"> 浏览器兼容。

trans-unit.source: In this example, we create two sets of interface elements for choosing times: a native picker created with <input type="time">, and a set of two <select> elements for choosing hours/minutes in older browsers that don't support the native input.

trans-unit.source: In this example, we present a simple interface with a <select> element that lets the user choose which country they're in, and a set of <input type="tel"> elements to let them enter each part of their phone number; there is no reason why you can't have multiple tel inputs.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们提供了一个简单的界面，其中包含一个 <select> 元素（可让用户选择他们所在的国家/地区）以及一组 <input type="tel"> 元素，以使他们输入其电话号码的每个部分; 没有理由不能有多个 tel 输入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the document only supports light mode, with a light background and dark foreground colors. trans-unit.source: Instead of <plaintext>, use the <pre> element or, if semantically accurate (such as for inline text), the <code> element. Escape any <, > and & characters, to prevent browsers inadvertently parsing content the element content as HTML.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the obsolete align attribute, you should instead use the CSS text-align property to establish left, center, right, or justify alignment for the row's cells. trans-unit.target: Intangible

trans-unit.source: Interactive components authored using non-interactive elements are not be listed in the accessibility tree. This prevents assistive technology from being able to navigate to and manipulate those components. The content should be semantically described using interactive elements (<a>, <button>, <details>, <input>, <select>, <textarea>, etc.) instead. These elements have built-in roles and states that communicate status to the accessibility that would otherwise have to be managed by ARIA.
trans-unit.target: 使用非交互式元素创作的交互式组件未在可访问性树中列出。这阻止了辅助技术能够导航和操纵那些组件。内容应使用交互式元素（ <a> ， <button> ， <details> ， <input> ， <select> ， <textarea> 等）在语义上进行描述。这些元素具有内置的角色和状态，可以将状态传达给可访问性，否则必须由ARIA管理。

These elements have built-in roles and states that communicate status to the accessibility that would otherwise have to be managed by ARIA.

trans-unit.source: Interactive elements such as buttons should provide an area large enough that it is easy to activate them. This helps a variety of people, including people with motor control issues and people using non-precise forms of input such as a stylus or fingers. A minimum interactive size of 44×44 CSS pixels is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 诸如按钮之类的交互式元素应提供足够大的区域，以便于激活它们。这对各种人都有帮助，包括运动控制问题的人和使用非精确形式的输入（例如手写笔或手指）的人。建议最小互动尺寸为44×44 CSS像素。

trans-unit.source: Interactive elements such as form input should provide an area large enough that it is easy to activate them. This helps a variety of people, including people with motor control issues and people using non-precise forms of input such as a stylus or fingers. A minimum interactive size of 44×44 CSS pixels is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 诸如表单输入之类的交互式元素应提供足够大的区域，以便于激活它们。这对各种人都有帮助，包括运动控制问题的人和使用非精确形式的输入（例如手写笔或手指）的人。建议最小互动尺寸为44×44 CSS像素。

trans-unit.source: Interactive elements, like links, placed in close visual proximity should have space separating them. Spacing helps people with motor control issues, who may otherwise accidentally activate the wrong interactive content.
trans-unit.target: 视觉上非常接近的互动元素,如链接,应该有空间将它们分开。间隔有助于有运动控制问题的人,否则他们可能会意外地激活错误的互动内容。

trans-unit.source: Interactive elements, like links, should provide an area large enough that it is easy to activate them. This helps a variety of people, including those with motor control issues and those using imprecise inputs such as a touchscreen. A minimum size of 44×44 CSS pixels is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 交互元素（如链接）应提供足够大的区域，以便于激活它们。这可以为各种人提供帮助，包括那些有运动控制问题的人以及使用不精确输入（例如触摸屏）的人。建议最小尺寸为44×44 CSS像素。

trans-unit.source: It's advisable to use the title attribute along with pattern. If you do, the titlemust describe the pattern. That is, it should explain what format the data should take on, rather than any other information. That's because the title may be displayed or spoken as part of a validation error message. For example, the browser might present the message "The entered text doesn't match the required pattern." followed by your specified title. If your title is something like "E-mail address", the result would be the message "The entered text doesn't match the required pattern. E-mail address", which isn't very good.
trans-unit.target: 建议将 title 属性与 pattern 一起使用。如果这样做， title 必须描述模式。也就是说，它应该说明数据应采用的格式，而不是其他任何信息。那是因为 title 可能作为验证错误消息的一部分显示或说出。例如，浏览器可能会显示消息“输入的文本与所需的模式不匹配”​​。然后是您指定的 title 。如果您的 title 类似于“电子邮件地址”，则结果将是消息“输入的文本与所需的模式不匹配。电子邮件地址”，这不是很好。

trans-unit.source: It's important to understand why different media formats are needed for the web. For various reasons mostly outside the scope of this article, different browsers support different media formats. Also, the area of media formats on the Web has greatly suffered from patent law in many countries including the USA and EU countries. (The notes on patents in this article are provided as-is and without any warranty.) This article discusses the formats most relevant to the web, including support in browsers on both mobile and desktop.

trans-unit.source: Its display value is block by default, and it establishes a block formatting context. If the <fieldset> is styled with an inline-level display value, it will behave as inline-block, otherwise it will behave as block. By default there is a 2pxgroove border surrounding the contents, and a small amount of default padding. The element has min-inline-size: min-content by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它的 display 值是 block ，并且它建立一个块格式化上下文。如果 <fieldset> 用内联级别的 display 值设置样式，则其行为将像 inline-block ，否则它将表现为 block 。默认情况下，内容周围有 2px 的 groove 边框，以及少量的默认填充。元素具有 min-inline-size: min-content 默认为min-content。

trans-unit.source: Its display value is block by default, and it establishes a block formatting context. If the <fieldset> is styled with an inline-level display value, it will behave as inline-block, otherwise it will behave as block. By default there is a 2px groove border surrounding the contents, and a small amount of default padding. The element has min-inline-size: min-content by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它的 display 值是 block ，它建立一个块格式化上下文。如果 <fieldset> 用内联级别的 display 值设置样式，则其将充当 inline-block ，否则将充当 block 。默认情况下，内容周围有2px的凹槽边框，以及少量的默认填充。元素具有 min-inline-size: min-content 默认为min-content。

trans-unit.source: JavaScript uses double precision floating points to store dates, as with all numbers, meaning that JavaScript code will not suffer from the Y2K38 problem unless integer coercion/bit-hacks are used because all JavaScript bit operators use 32-bit signed 2s-complement integers.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript和所有的数字一样,使用双精度浮点数来存储日期,这意味着JavaScript代码不会受到Y2K38问题的影响,除非使用整数胁迫/位黑客,因为所有JavaScript位运算符都使用32位有符号的2s补码整数。

trans-unit.source: Keyboard shortcuts, also known as access keys and keyboard equivalents, let the user trigger a button using a key or combination of keys on the keyboard. To add a keyboard shortcut to a button — just as you would with any <input> for which it makes sense — you use the accesskey global attribute.
trans-unit.target: 键盘快捷键，也称为访问键和键盘等效键，使用户可以使用键盘上的一个键或多个键的组合来触发按钮。要将键盘快捷键添加到按钮（就像使用任何有意义的 <input> 一样)，请使用 accesskey 全局属性。

trans-unit.source: Keyboard shortcuts, also known as access keys and keyboard equivalents, let the user trigger a button using a key or combination of keys on the keyboard. To add a keyboard shortcut to a submit button — just as you would with any <input> for which it makes sense — you use the accesskey global attribute.
trans-unit.target: 键盘快捷键，也称为访问键和键盘等效键，使用户可以使用键盘上的一个键或多个键的组合来触发按钮。要将键盘快捷方式添加到提交按钮（就像使用任何有意义的 <input> 一样)，请使用 accesskey 全局属性。

trans-unit.source: Labels are needed to associate assistive text with an <input>. The <label> element provides explanatory information about a form field that is always appropriate (aside from any layout concerns you have). It's never a bad idea to use a <label> to explain what should be entered into an <input> or <textarea>.
trans-unit.target: 需要使用标签将辅助文本与 <input> 关联。所述 <label> 元素提供有关一个形式字段是说明信息总是适当（除了任何布局关注你有）。使用 <label> 解释应该在 <input> 或 <textarea> 中输入什么绝不是坏主意。

trans-unit.source: Labels are not themselves directly associated with forms. They are only indirectly associated with forms through the controls with which they're associated.
trans-unit.target: 标签本身并不直接与表单相关联。它们只是通过与其相关联的控件间接地与表单相关联。

trans-unit.source: Large amounts of interactive content — including buttons — placed in close visual proximity to each other should have space separating them. This spacing is beneficial for people who are experiencing motor control issues, who may accidentally activate the wrong interactive content.
trans-unit.target: 大量交互式内容（包括按钮）应彼此紧密地放置在视觉上，应将它们隔开。此间距对于遇到运动控制问题的人很有用，他们可能会意外激活错误的交互式内容。

trans-unit.source: Large amounts of interactive content—including anchors—placed in close visual proximity to each other should have space inserted to separate them. This spacing is beneficial for people who are experiencing motor control issues, who may accidentally activate the wrong interactive content while navigating.
trans-unit.target: 大量交互式内容（包括锚点）应放置在视觉上彼此靠近的位置，并应插入空格以将它们分开。此间距对于遇到运动控制问题的人员很有用，他们可能会在导航时意外激活错误的交互式内容。

trans-unit.source: Large amounts of interactive content—including buttons—placed in close visual proximity to each other should have space inserted to separate them. This spacing is beneficial for people who are experiencing motor control issues, who may accidentally activate the wrong interactive content.
trans-unit.target: 大量交互式内容（包括按钮）应放置在视觉上彼此靠近的位置，应插入空格以将它们分开。此间距对于遇到电机控制问题的人员很有用，他们可能会意外激活错误的交互式内容。

trans-unit.source: Let's consider a quick example of selecting an appropriate color palette for a site. Imagine that you're building a web site for a new game that takes place on the planet Mars. So let's do a Google search for photos of Mars. Lots of good examples of Martian coloration there. We carefully avoid the mockups and the photos from movies. And we decide to use a photo taken by one of the Mars landers humanity has parked on the surface over the last few decades, since the game takes place on the planet's surface. We use a color picker tool to select a sample of the color we choose.
trans-unit.target: 让我们考虑一个为站点选择适当调色板的简单示例。想象一下，您正在为一个在火星上发生的新游戏建立一个网站。因此，让我们用Google搜索火星的照片。那里有许多很好的火星着色的例子。我们会仔细避免样机和电影中的照片。而且，我们决定使用过去几十年来人类在火星登陆器上拍摄的照片，因为该游戏是在地球表面进行的。我们使用颜色选择器工具选择我们选择的颜色的样本。

trans-unit.source: Let's consider a quick example of selecting an appropriate color palette for a site. Imagine that you're building a website for a new game that takes place on the planet Mars. So let's do a Google search for photos of Mars. Lots of good examples of Martian coloration there. We carefully avoid the mockups and the photos from movies. And we decide to use a photo taken by one of the Mars landers humanity has parked on the surface over the last few decades, since the game takes place on the planet's surface. We use a color picker tool to select a sample of the color we choose.
trans-unit.target: 让我们考虑一个为站点选择合适的调色板的简单示例。想象一下，您正在为一个在火星上发生的新游戏建立一个网站。因此，让我们用Google搜索火星的照片。那里有许多很好的火星着色的例子。我们会仔细避免电影中的样机和照片。而且，我们决定使用过去几十年来人类在火星登陆器上拍摄的照片，因为该游戏是在地球表面进行的。我们使用颜色选择器工具选择我们选择的颜色的样本。

trans-unit.source: Let's take a closer look at the e-mail address entry box. trans-unit.source: Lets the canvas know whether or not translucency will be a factor. If the canvas knows there's no translucency, painting performance can be optimized. This is only supported by Mozilla-based browsers; use the standardized canvas.getContext('2d', { alpha: false }) instead.
trans-unit.target: 让画布知道半透明性是否会成为一个因素。如果画布知道没有透明感，则可以优化绘画性能。仅基于Mozilla的浏览器支持此功能。请使用标准化的 canvas.getContext('2d', { alpha: false }) 。

trans-unit.source: Lets you draw images using commands that draw specific shapes, patterns, and lines to produce an image. SVG commands are formatted as XML, and can be embedded directly into a web page or can be placed in he page using the <img> element, just like any other type of image.
trans-unit.target: 使您可以使用绘制特定形状，图案和线条以生成图像的命令来绘制图像。SVG命令的格式为XML，可以直接嵌入到网页中，也可以使用 <img> 元素放置在网页中，就像其他任何类型的图像一样。

trans-unit.source: Like all other HTML elements, this element supports the global attributes, except that the dir attribute behaves differently than normal: it defaults to auto, meaning its value is never inherited from the parent element. This means that unless you specify a value of either "rtl" or "ltr" for dir, the user agent will determine the correct directionality to use based on the contents of the <bdi>.
trans-unit.target: 与所有其他HTML元素一样，此元素也支持全局属性，但 dir 属性的行为不同于常规属性：默认为 auto ，这意味着它的值永远不会从父元素继承。这意味着，除非指定任一值 "rtl" 或 "ltr" 用于 dir 中，用户代理将确定正确的方向性使用基于的内容 <bdi> 。

trans-unit.source: Like all other HTML elements, this element supports the global attributes, except that the dir attribute behaves differently than normal: it defaults to auto, meaning its value is never inherited from the parent element. This means that unless you specify a value of either rtl or ltr for dir, the user agent will determine the correct directionality to use based on the contents of the <bdi>.
trans-unit.target: 与所有其他HTML元素一样，此元素也支持global属性，但 dir 属性的行为不同于常规属性：默认为 auto ，这意味着它的值永远不会从父元素继承。这意味着，除非指定任一的值 rtl 或 ltr 为 dir ，所述用户代理将确定正确的方向性使用基于的内容 <bdi> 。

trans-unit.source: Loads the response into the parent browsing context of the current one. If there is no parent context, this behaves the same as "_self".

trans-unit.source: Loads the response into the same browsing context as the one that contains the form. This will replace the current document with the received data. This is the default value used if none is specified.

trans-unit.source: Loads the response into the top-level browsing context; this is the browsing context that is the topmost ancestor of the current context. If the current context is the topmost context, this behaves the same as "_self".
trans-unit.target: 将响应加载到顶级浏览上下文中；这是浏览上下文，它是当前上下文的最高级祖先。如果当前上下文是最顶层的上下文，则其行为与 "_self" 相同。

trans-unit.source: Making the right choices when selecting colors when designing a web site can be a tricky process, especially if you aren't well-grounded in art, design, or at least basic color theory. The wrong color choice can render your site unattractive, or even worse, leave the content unreadable due to problems with contrast or conflicting colors. Worse still, if using the wrong colors can result in your content being outright unusable by people withcertain vision problems, particularly color blindness.
trans-unit.target: 在设计网站时,在选择颜色时做出正确的选择是一个棘手的过程,特别是如果你没有良好的艺术、设计或至少是基本的色彩理论基础。错误的颜色选择会使你的网站失去吸引力,甚至更糟糕的是,由于对比度或颜色冲突的问题,使内容无法阅读。更糟糕的是,如果使用了错误的颜色,可能会导致有视力问题的人,尤其是色盲,无法直接使用你的内容。

trans-unit.source: Making the right choices when selecting colors when designing a website can be a tricky process, especially if you aren't well-grounded in art, design, or at least basic color theory. The wrong color choice can render your site unattractive, or even worse, leave the content unreadable due to problems with contrast or conflicting colors. Worse still, if using the wrong colors can result in your content being outright unusable by people withcertain vision problems, particularly color blindness.

trans-unit.source: Microdata
trans-unit.target: Microdata

trans-unit.source: Microdata is part of the WHATWG HTML Standard and is used to nest metadata within existing content on web pages. Search engines and web crawlers can extract and process microdata from a web page and use it to provide a richer browsing experience for users. Search engines benefit greatly from direct access to this structured data because it allows search engines to understand the information on web pages and provide more relevant results to users. Microdata uses a supporting vocabulary to describe an item and name-value pairs to assign values to its properties. Microdata is an attempt to provide a simpler way of annotating HTML elements with machine-readable tags than the similar approaches of using RDFa and classic microformats.
trans-unit.target: 微数据是WHATWG HTML标准的一部分，用于将元数据嵌套在网页上的现有内容中。搜索引擎和网络搜寻器可以从网页中提取和处理微数据，并使用它为用户提供更丰富的浏览体验。搜索引擎直接访问此结构化数据将极大地受益，因为它使搜索引擎能够理解网页上的信息并为用户提供更多相关的结果。微数据使用辅助词汇表来描述项目和名称-值对，以为其属性分配值。与使用RDFa和经典微格式的类似方法相比，微数据是一种尝试提供一种使用机器可读标签为HTML元素添加注释的简单方法。

trans-unit.source: Microdata is part of the WHATWG HTML Standard and is used to nest metadata within existing content on web pages.[1] Search engines, web crawlers, and browsers can extract and process microdata from a web page and use it to provide a richer browsing experience for users. Search engines benefit greatly from direct access to this structured data because it allows search engines to understand the information on web pages and provide more relevant results to users. Microdata uses a supporting vocabulary to describe an item and name-value pairs to assign values to its properties. Microdata is an attempt to provide a simpler way of annotating HTML elements with machine-readable tags than the similar approaches of using RDFa and microformats.
trans-unit.target: 微数据是WHATWG HTML标准的一部分，用于将元数据嵌套在网页上的现有内容中。[1]搜索引擎，网络搜寻器和浏览器可以从网页中提取和处理微数据，并使用它为用户提供更丰富的浏览体验。搜索引擎直接访问此结构化数据将极大地受益，因为它使搜索引擎能够理解网页上的信息并为用户提供更多相关的结果。微数据使用辅助词汇表来描述项目和名称/值对，以为其属性分配值。与使用RDFa和微格式的类似方法相比，微数据是一种尝试提供一种使用机器可读标签为HTML元素添加注释的简单方法。

trans-unit.source: Microdata vocabularies provide the semantics or meaning of an Item. Web developers can design a custom vocabulary or use vocabularies available on the web, such as the widely used schema.org vocabulary. A collection of commonly used markup vocabularies are provided by Schema.org.
trans-unit.target: 微数据词汇表提供了项目的语义或含义。Web开发人员可以设计自定义词汇表或使用Web上可用的词汇表，例如广泛使用的schema.org词汇表。Schema.org提供了一组常用的标记词汇。

trans-unit.source: Microdata vocabularies provide the semantics or meaning of an Item. Web developers can design a custom vocabulary or use vocabularies available on the web, such as the widely used schema.org vocabulary. A collection of commonly used markup vocabularies are provided by Schema.org.
trans-unit.target: 微数据词汇表提供了项目的语义或含义。Web开发人员可以设计自定义词汇表或使用Web上可用的词汇表，例如广泛使用的schema.org词汇表。Schema.org提供了常用标记词汇的集合。

trans-unit.source: Most notable here is the use of the -moz-appearance property (with prefixes needed to support some browsers). By default, radio buttons (and checkboxes) are styled with the operating system's native styles for those controls. By specifying appearance: none, you can remove the native styling altogether, and create your own styles for them. Here we've used a border along with border-radius and a transition to create a nice animating radio selection. Notice also how the :checked pseudo-class is used to specify the styles for the radio button's appearance when selected.
trans-unit.target: 这里最值得注意的是 -moz-appearance 属性的使用（带有支持某些浏览器所需的前缀）。默认情况下，单选按钮（和复选框）使用这些控件的操作系统本机样式设置样式。通过指定 appearance: none ，您可以完全删除本机样式，并为其创建自己的样式。在这里，我们使用了一个 border ，一个边框 border-radius 和一个 transition 来创建一个动画动画选择。还请注意 :checked ，：checked伪类如何用于指定单选按钮外观的样式。

trans-unit.source: Most of the CSS is unchanged. We do, however, add a slightly more subtle style for header cells contained directly within a <tbody> (as opposed to those which reside in a <thead>). This is used for the headers indicating each table section's corresponding major.
trans-unit.target: 大多数CSS保持不变。但是，我们确实为直接包含在 <tbody> 中的标头单元格添加了稍微微妙的样式（与那些驻留在 <thead> 中的标头单元格相反）。这用于指示每个表节的对应专业的标题。

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, IDL attributes will return their values as they are really used. For example, the default type for <input> elements is "text", so if you set input.type="foobar", the <input> element will be of type text (in the appearance and the behavior) but the "type" content attribute's value will be "foobar". However, the type IDL attribute will return the string "text".
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，IDL属性将返回其实际使用的值。例如，默认 type 为 <input> 元素为“文本”，因此，如果集 input.type="foobar" ，则 <input> 元素将是类型文本（在外观和行为），但“类型的内容属性的值将为“ foobar”。但是， type IDL属性将返回字符串“ text”。

trans-unit.source: Never access cached files by using traditional GET parameters (like other-cached-page.html?parameterName=value). This will make the browser bypass the cache and attempt to get it from network. To link to cached resources that have parameters parsed in JavaScript use parameters in the hash part of the link, such as other-cached-page.html#whatever?parameterName=value.
trans-unit.target: 切勿使用传统的GET参数（例如 other-cached-page.html?parameterName=value ）访问缓存的文件。这将使浏览器绕过缓存并尝试从网络获取它。要链接到具有在JavaScript中解析过的参数的缓存资源，请使用链接的哈希部分中的参数，例如 other-cached-page.html#whatever?parameterName=value 。

trans-unit.source: Never call document.write() from an async script. In Firefox 3.6, calling document.write() has an unpredictable effect. In Firefox 4, calling document.write() from an async script has no effect (other than printing a warning to the error console).
trans-unit.target: 切勿从异步脚本调用 document.write() 。在Firefox 3.6中，调用 document.write() 会产生不可预期的影响。在Firefox 4中，从异步脚本调用 document.write() 无效（除了在错误控制台上打印警告）。

trans-unit.source: Normal script elements pass minimal information to the window.onerror for scripts which do not pass the standard CORS checks. To allow error logging for sites which use a separate domain for static media, use this attribute. See CORS settings attributes for a more descriptive explanation of its valid arguments.

trans-unit.source: Normal script elements pass minimal information to the window.onerror for scripts which do not pass the standard CORS checks. trans-unit.source: Not only are we providing the MIME type hints in the type attributes, but we are also providing the crossorigin attribute to make sure the preload's CORS mode matches the eventual font resource request.

trans-unit.source: Not only is the placeholder not accessible to screen readers, but once the user enters any text into the form control, or if the form control already has a value, the placeholder disappears. Browsers with automatic page translation features may skip over attributes when translating, meaning the placeholder may not get translated.
trans-unit.target: 不仅屏幕阅读器无法访问占位符，而且一旦用户在表单控件中输入任何文本，或者如果表单控件已经具有值，占位符就会消失。具有自动页面翻译功能的浏览器在翻译时可能会跳过属性，这意味着 placeholder 可能无法翻译。

trans-unit.source: Not part of any specification. Use the CSS white-space property instead.
trans-unit.target: 不属于任何规范。请改用CSS white-space 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: Note

trans-unit.source: Note color and range don't support required, but type color defaults to #000000, and range defaults to the midpoint between min and max -- with min and max defaulting to 0 and 100 respectively in most browsers if not declared -- so always has a value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， color 和 range 不支持 required ，但类型 color 默认为 #000000 ，并且 range 默认为 min 和 max 之间的中点-如果未声明，则在大多数浏览器中 min 和 max 分别默认为0和100-因此始终有一个价值。

trans-unit.source: Note how we've included two <rb> elements, to delimit the two separate parts of the ruby base text. The annotation on the other hand is delimited by two <rt> elements.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，我们如何包含两个 <rb> 元素，以分隔红宝石基础文本的两个独立部分。另一方面，注释由两个 <rt> 元素定界。

trans-unit.source: Note that minlength doesn't stop the user from removing characters so that the number entered goes past the minimum, but it does make the value entered into the <textarea> invalid. Also note that even if you have a minlength value set (3, for example), an empty <textarea> is still considered valid unless you also have the required attribute set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， minlength 不会阻止用户删除字符，以使输入的数字超过最小值，但确实会使输入 <textarea> 的值无效。还要注意，即使您设置了一个 minlength 值（例如3），除非您也设置了 required 属性，否则空的 <textarea> 仍然被认为是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Note that Firefox can customize the required modifier key by user's preferences.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,Firefox可以根据用户的喜好自定义所需的修饰键。

trans-unit.source: Note that although its allowed values include true and false, this attribute is an enumerated one and not a Boolean one.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，尽管其允许的值包括 true 和 false ，但此属性是枚举值，而不是布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Note that both the year and week numbers are padded with leading zeroes, with the year padded to four digits and the week to two.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,年号和周号都是用前导零垫起来的,年号垫到四位,周号垫到两位。

trans-unit.source: Note that in this example the min attribute is omitted. This is allowed, as it will default to 0.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在此示例中，忽略了 min 属性。这是允许的，因为它将默认为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Note that in this example the min attribute is omitted; this is allowed, as it will default to 0.
trans-unit.target: 注意，在此示例中，min属性被省略；这是允许的，因为它将默认为0。

trans-unit.source: Note that the HTMLElement.dataset property is a DOMStringMap, and the name of the custom data attribute data-test-value will be accessible via HTMLElement.dataset.testValue ( or HTMLElement.dataset["testValue"] ) as any dash (U+002D) is replaced by the capitalization of the next letter, converting the name to camelcase.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， HTMLElement.dataset 属性是 DOMStringMap ，并且自定义数据属性data-test-value的名称将通过 HTMLElement.dataset.testValue （或 HTMLElement.dataset["testValue"]  ）以任意破折号（ U+002D ）替换为下一个字母的大写字母，将名称转换为驼峰大写。

trans-unit.source: Note that the HTMLElement.dataset property is a DOMStringMap, and the name of the custom data attribute data-test-value will be accessible via HTMLElement.dataset.testValue (or by HTMLElement.dataset["testValue"]) as any dash (U+002D) is replaced by the capitalization of the next letter, converting the name to camelcase.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， HTMLElement.dataset 属性是 DOMStringMap ，并且自定义数据属性data-test-value的名称将通过 HTMLElement.dataset.testValue （或通过 HTMLElement.dataset["testValue"] ）作为任何破折号（ U+002D ）替换为下一个字母的大写字母，将名称转换为驼峰大写。

trans-unit.source: Note that the normalized form of this date drops the ":00" indicating the number of seconds to be zero, because the seconds are optional when zero, and the normalized string minimizes the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此日期的规范化形式会删除表示秒数为零的“ :00 ”，因为当为零时，秒数是可选的，并且规范化的字符串会最小化字符串的长度。

trans-unit.source: Note that the default styling for the <cite> element renders the text in italics. You can, if you wish, override that using CSS:
trans-unit.target: 请注意， <cite> 元素的默认样式以斜体显示文本。您可以根据需要使用CSS覆盖该代码：

trans-unit.source: Note that this doesn't have to be limited to images, or even files of the same type — think big! You could perhaps preload then display a simple SVG diagram if the user is on a narrow screen where bandwidth and CPU is potentially more limited, or preload a complex chunk of JavaScript then use it to render an interactive 3D model if the user's resources are more plentiful.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这并不仅限于图像甚至相同类型的文件，请放心！如果用户位于带宽和CPU可能受到限制的狭窄屏幕上，则可以预加载然后显示一个简单的SVG图，或者如果用户的资源更丰富，则可以预加载复杂的JavaScript块然后使用它来呈现交互式3D模型。 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is not even close to an adequate filter for valid e-mail addresses; it would allow things such as " @beststartupever.com" (note the leading space) or "@@beststartupever.com", neither of which is valid. However, the browser runs both the standard e-mail address filter and our custom pattern against the specified text. As a result, we wind up with a validation which says "make sure this resembles a valid e-mail address, and if it is, make sure it's also a beststartupever.com address."
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于有效的电子邮件地址，这甚至还远远不够。它将允许诸如“ @ beststartupever.com”（请注意前导空格）或“ @@ beststartupever.com”之类的东西都无效。但是，浏览器针对指定的文本运行标准的电子邮件地址过滤器和我们的自定义模式。结果，我们得到一个验证，验证结果为“确保该地址类似于有效的电子邮件地址，如果是，请确保它也是beststartupever.com地址。”

trans-unit.source: Note that we could also write this example with the two base text parts annotated completely separately. In this case we don't need to include <rb> elements:
trans-unit.target: 注意，我们也可以用完全注释的两个基础文本部分来编写此示例。在这种情况下，我们不需要包含 <rb> 元素：

trans-unit.source: Note that when noopener is used, nonempty target names other than _top, _self, and _parent are all treated like _blank in terms of deciding whether to open a new window/tab.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当使用 noopener 时，就决定是否打开新窗口/选项卡而言， _top ， _self 和 _parent 以外的非空目标名称都被视为 _blank 。

trans-unit.source: Note that when the user clicks the button, we remove the required attribute(s) from the input(s) we are hiding, and empty the value attribute(s). This is so that we can submit the form if both input sets aren't filled in, and won't submit data that we didn't mean to submit. If we didn't do this, you'd have to fill in both feet/inches and meters to submit the form!
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当用户单击按钮时，我们从隐藏的输入中删除了 required 属性，并清空了 value 属性。这样一来，如果两个输入集都未填写，我们就可以提交表单，并且不会提交我们本不想提交的数据。如果我们不这样做，则您必须填写英尺/英寸和米来提交表格！

trans-unit.source: Note that when you omit the hue's unit, it's assumed to be in degrees (deg).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当您省略色相的单位时，会假定它以度（ deg ）为单位。

trans-unit.source: Note that writing balanced tags may cause other tags to be inferred in a way that makes the write unbalanced. E.g. <script>document.write("<div></div>");</script> inside the head element will be interpreted as <script>document.write("</head><body><div></div>");</script> which is unbalanced.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，写入平衡标签可能会导致其他标签被推断，从而导致写入不平衡。例如， head 元素内的 <script>document.write("<div></div>");</script> 将解释为 <script>document.write("</head><body><div></div>");</script> 不平衡。

trans-unit.source: Note the "Next" key in the lower-right corner of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 注意键盘右下角的 "下一步 "键。

trans-unit.source: Note the <abbr> element nested inside the <dfn>. The former establishes that the term is an abbreviation ("HST") and specifies the full term ("Hubble Space Telescope") in its title attribute. The latter indicates that the abbreviated term represents a term being defined.
trans-unit.target: 注意 <dfn> 内嵌套的 <abbr> 元素。前者确定该术语为缩写（“ HST”），并在其 title 属性中指定完整术语（“ Hubble Space Telescope”）。后者表示缩写术语代表所定义的术语。

trans-unit.source: Note the difference in appearance between the example with multiple set and the other file input without.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，具有 multiple 设置的示例与不带多个设置的其他 file 输入之间，外观上的差异。

trans-unit.source: Note the difference in appearance between the two form controls.
trans-unit.target: 请注意两个表单控件的外观差异。

trans-unit.source: Note the last example allows you to select multiple iamges. See the multiple attribute for more information.

trans-unit.source: Notice how the entered value is reported as invalid unless the pattern xxx-xxx-xxxx is matched; for instance, 41-323-421 won't be accepted. Neither will 800-MDN-ROCKS. However, 865-555-6502 will be accepted. This particular pattern is obviously only useful for certain locales — in a real application you'd probably have to vary the pattern used depending on the locale of the user.
trans-unit.target: 注意，除非匹配模式xxx-xxx-xxxx，否则输入的值将被报告为无效；例如41-323-421将不被接受。800-MDN-ROCKS也不会。但是，将接受865-555-6502。显然，这种特定模式仅对某些语言环境有用-在实际的应用程序中，您可能必须根据用户的语言环境来更改所使用的模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice how the heading area here is actually two rows, one with "Name", "ID", "Membership Dates", and "Balance" headings, and the other with "Joined" and "Canceled", which are sub-headings below "Membership Dates". This is accomplished by:
trans-unit.target: 注意这里的标题区其实是两行,一行是 "姓名"、"ID"、"会员日期"、"余额 "标题,另一行是 "加入 "和 "取消",是 "会员日期 "下面的小标题。具体做法是:

trans-unit.source: Notice that after normalization, this is the same string as the previous datetime-local string. The space has been replaced with the "T" character and the trailing zero in the fraction of a second has been removed to make the string as short as possible.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在标准化之后，该字符串与先前的 datetime-local 字符串相同。空格已被替换为“ T ”字符，并且在零点几秒内删除了结尾的零以使字符串尽可能短。

trans-unit.source: Notice that all years are at least four characters long; years that are fewer than four digits long are padded with leading zeroes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,所有年份的长度至少为四个字符,长度小于四位数的年份用前导零填充。

trans-unit.source: Notice that each major is placed in a separate <tbody> block, the first row of which contains a single <th> element with a colspan attribute that spans the entire width of the table. That heading lists the name of the major contained within the <tbody>.
trans-unit.target: 注意，每个专业都放置在单独的 <tbody> 块中，该块的第一行包含一个单独的 <th> 元素，该元素的 colspan 属性跨越整个表的整个宽度。该标题列出了 <tbody> 中包含的专业名称。

trans-unit.source: Notice that it's considered valid when empty and when a single validly-formatted URL address is entered, but is otherwise not considered valid. By adding the required attribute, only properly-formed URLs are allowed; the input is no longer considered valid when empty.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当为空且输入单个有效格式的URL地址时，该地址被视为有效，但否则被视为无效。通过添加 required 属性，仅允许使用格式正确的URL。输入为空时不再被视为有效。

trans-unit.source: Notice that it's considered valid when empty and when a single validly-formatted e-mail address is entered, but is otherwise not considered valid. By adding the required attribute, only validly-formed e-mail addresses are allowed; the input is no longer considered valid when empty.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当为空且输入单个有效格式的电子邮件地址时，该地址被视为有效，但否则被视为无效。通过添加 required 属性，仅允许使用格式正确的电子邮件地址；输入为空时不再被视为有效。

trans-unit.source: Notice that we're not explicitly setting the text color. That means the value of color will be inherited from the nearest containing element that defines it. By default, that's black.
trans-unit.target: 注意，我们没有明确设置文本颜色。这意味着 color 的值将从定义它的最近的包含元素的值继承。默认情况下为黑色。

trans-unit.source: Notice that when clicking on a radio button, there's a nice, smooth fade out/in effect as the two buttons change state. In addition, the style and coloring of the legend and submit button are customized to have strong contrast. This might not be a look you'd want in a real web application, but it definitely shows off the possibilities.
trans-unit.target: 注意,当点击单选按钮时,当两个按钮改变状态时,会有一个很好的、平滑的淡出/进入效果。此外,图例和提交按钮的样式和颜色都是自定义的,具有强烈的对比度。这可能不是你在真实的web应用中想要的样子,但它绝对展示了可能性。

November, 1993

Now it's time to actually save the image locally. To do this, we use the Web Storage API's local storage mechanism, which is accessed through the localStorage global. The canvas method toDataURL() is used to convert the image into a data:// URL representing a PNG image, which is then saved into local storage using setItem().
trans-unit.target: 现在是时候将图像实际保存在本地了。为此，我们使用Web Storage API的本地存储机制，可通过 localStorage 全局访问该机制。canvas方法 toDataURL() 用于将图像转换为表示PNG图像的data：// URL，然后使用 setItem() 将其保存到本地存储中。

trans-unit.source: Now let's apply some CSS to customize the appearance of the disclosure box.
trans-unit.target: 现在让我们应用一些CSS来定制披露框的外观。

trans-unit.source: Now let's change that <span> into a block-level element, such as <p>:
trans-unit.target: 现在让我们将 <span> 更改为块级元素，例如 <p> ：

trans-unit.source: Now on to the CSS — this looks very similar to the validation styling we saw before; nothing remarkable here:
trans-unit.target: 现在到CSS上-这看起来与我们之前看到的验证样式非常相似；这里没有什么特别的：

trans-unit.source: Now that the server has been configured to allow retrieval of the images cross-origin, we can write the code that allows the user to save them to local local storage, just as if they were being served from the same domain the code is running on.
trans-unit.target: 现在已经将服务器配置为允许跨源检索图像，我们可以编写代码，使用户可以将它们保存到本地本地存储中，就像它们是从运行代码的同一域中提供的一样。

trans-unit.source: Now that the table has been created and the template defined, we use JavaScript to insert rows into the table, with each row being constructed using the template as its basis.
trans-unit.target: 现在已经创建了表并定义了模板,我们使用JavaScript将行插入到表中,每一行都是以模板为基础构造的。

trans-unit.source: Now that you have a grey paint and a perfectly vivid color, you need to mix them together. The saturation (S) component of the color indicates what percentage of the final color should be comprised of that perfectly vivid color. The rest of the final color is made up of the grey paint that represents the saturation.
trans-unit.target: 现在,你已经有了一种灰色的颜料和一种完全鲜艳的颜色,你需要把它们混合在一起。颜色的饱和度(S)分量表示最终颜色中该完美鲜艳的颜色应占多大比例。最终颜色的其余部分是由代表饱和度的灰色颜料组成的。

trans-unit.source: Now that you know what CSS properties exist that let you apply color to elements and the formats you can use to describe colors, you can put this together to begin to make use of color. As you may have seen from the list under Things that can have color, there are plenty of things you can color with CSS. Let's look at this from two sides: using color within a stylesheet, and adding and changing color using JavaScript code to alter the styles of elements.
trans-unit.target: 现在您已经知道存在哪些CSS属性，可以将颜色应用于元素以及可以用来描述颜色的格式，接下来可以将它们放在一起以开始使用颜色。正如您可能在“ 可以具有颜色的事物” 下的列表中看到的那样，您可以使用CSS进行许多着色。让我们从两个方面看待这个问题：在样式表中使用color ，以及使用JavaScript代码添加和更改颜色以更改元素的样式。

trans-unit.source: Now we have our base color and our accent. On top of that, we have a few complementary shades of each, just in case we need them for gradients and the like. The colors can then be exported in a number of formats so you can make use of them.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们有了基础色和重点色。除此之外,我们还为每种颜色准备了一些互补色,以备我们在渐变等方面的需要。然后,这些颜色可以以多种格式导出,以便你可以利用它们。

trans-unit.source: Now we need some CSS. First is the CSS for the wrapper itself; this specifies the display mode and size we want so that the page lays out correctly; in essence, it's reserving an area of the page for the slider so that the rotated slider fits into the reserved space without making a mess of things.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们需要一些CSS。首先是包装器本身的CSS,它指定了我们想要的显示模式和大小,以便页面正确地排版;本质上,它是为滑块保留了页面的一个区域,以便旋转的滑块能够适应预留的空间,而不会弄得一团糟。

trans-unit.source: Now we'll go all-out, with styles on rows in the header and body areas both, including alternating row colors, cells with different colors depending on position within a row, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们将全力以赴,在页眉和正文区域的行上都有样式,包括行色交替、根据行内位置不同而有不同颜色的单元格等等。

trans-unit.source: Now, let's introduce another column that shows the date the user's membership ended, along with a super-heading above the "joined" and "canceled" dates called "Membership Dates". This involves adding both row and column spans to the table, so that the heading cells can wind up in the right places.
trans-unit.target: 现在,让我们引入另一列,显示用户会员资格结束的日期,以及 "加入 "和 "取消 "日期上方的超级标题,称为 "会员日期"。这涉及到在表格中增加行和列的跨度,这样标题单元格就可以缠绕在正确的位置上。

trans-unit.source: Now, onto the CSS. This looks very similar to the validation styling we saw before; nothing remarkable here.
trans-unit.target: 现在,进入CSS。这看起来和我们之前看到的验证样式非常相似,没有什么特别之处。

trans-unit.source: Omitting alt altogether indicates that the image is a key part of the content and no textual equivalent is available. Setting this attribute to an empty string (alt="") indicates that this image is not a key part of the content (it’s decoration or a tracking pixel), and that non-visual browsers may omit it from rendering. Visual browsers will also hide the broken image icon if the alt is empty and the image failed to display.
trans-unit.target: 忽略 alt 干脆表示该图像是内容的一个重要组成部分，没有文本等值可用。将此属性设置为空字符串（ alt="" ）表示此图像不是内容的关键部分（它是装饰或跟踪像素），并且非可视浏览器可能会忽略它进行渲染。如果 alt 为空并且图像无法显示，则可视浏览器还将隐藏损坏的图像图标。

trans-unit.source: On November 1992, indexes as links rather than documents started by Dan Connolly who is pushing the idea that indexes are more links than documents. In this thread, different type of solutions are proposed. The question of forms for making queries is mentioned in reference to Dynatext browser: "The browser displays toggle buttons, text fields etc. The user fills in the fields, clicks OK, and the query results come up in the table of contents window."
trans-unit.target: 1992年11月，Dan Connolly提出了将索引作为链接而不是文档的观点，Dan Connolly提出了一个想法，即索引比文档更是链接。在该线程中，提出了不同类型的解决方案。关于Dynatext浏览器，提到了查询形式的问题：“浏览器显示切换按钮，文本字段等。用户填写字段，单击“确定”，然后在目录表中显示查询结果。”

trans-unit.source: On November 1992, indexes as links rather than documents started by Dan Connolly who is pushing the idea that indexes are more links than documents. In this thread, different type of solutions are proposed. The question of forms for making queries is mentioned in reference to Dynatext browser: "The browser displays toggle buttons, text fields etc. The user fills in the fields, clicks OK, and the query results come up in the table of contents window."
trans-unit.target: 1992年11月，Dan Connolly提出了将索引作为链接而不是文档，Dan Connolly提出了这样的想法，即索引比文档更是链接。在该线程中，提出了不同类型的解决方案。关于Dynatext浏览器，提到了查询形式的问题：“浏览器显示切换按钮，文本字段等。用户填写这些字段，单击“确定”，然后在目录表中显示查询结果。”

trans-unit.source: On UTF-8 encoded pages, <wbr> behaves like the U+200B ZERO-WIDTH SPACE code point. In particular, it behaves like a Unicode bidi BN code point, meaning it has no effect on bidi-ordering: <div dir=rtl>123,<wbr>456</div> displays, when not broken on two lines, 123,456 and not 456,123.
trans-unit.target: 在UTF-8编码的页面上， <wbr> 的行为类似于 U+200B ZERO-WIDTH SPACE 代码点。特别是，它的行为就像一个Unicode比迪BN代码点，这意味着它具有不影响比迪-ordering： <div dir=rtl>123,<wbr>456</div> 显示器，当不破两行上， 123,456 和不是 456,123 。

trans-unit.target: 在UTF-8编码的页面上， <wbr> 的行为类似于 U+200B ZERO-WIDTH SPACE 代码点。特别是，它的行为类似于Unicode bidi BN代码点，这意味着它对bidi顺序没有影响： <div dir=rtl>123,<wbr>456</div> 显示时，如果没有在两行 123,456 和不是 456,123 。

trans-unit.source: Once all the files have been successfully retrieved, they are moved into the real offline cache automatically, and a cached event is sent to the applicationCache object. Since the document has already been loaded into the browser from the cache, the updated document will not be rendered until the document is reloaded (either manually or programatically).
trans-unit.target: 成功检索所有文件后，它们会自动移到真正的脱机缓存中，并且已 cached 事件将发送到 applicationCache 对象。由于该文档已经从缓存中加载到浏览器中，因此只有在重新加载文档后（手动或编程方式），才会呈现更新的文档。

trans-unit.source: Once you have decided on your base color, there are plenty of online tools that can help you build out a palette of appropriate colors to use along with your base color by applying color theory to your base color to determine appropriate added colors. Many of these tools also support viewing the colors filtered so you can see what they would look like to people with various forms of color blindness. See Color and accessibility for a brief explanation of why this matters.
trans-unit.target: 一旦确定了基础色，就会有很多在线工具可以通过将颜色理论应用于基础色来确定适当的添加颜色，从而帮助您构建适当的调色板以与基础色一起使用。这些工具中的许多工具还支持查看过滤后的颜色，因此您可以查看各种色盲形式的人看起来像什么。有关其重要性的简要说明，请参见颜色和可访问性。

trans-unit.source: Once you have these colors, you will probably still need to select appropriate neutral colors. Common design practice is to try to find the sweet spot where there's just enough contrast that the text is crisp and readable but not enough contrast to become harsh for the eyes. It's easy to go too far in one way or another so be sure to get feedback on your colors once you've selected them and have examples of them in use available. If the contrast is too low, your text will tend to be washed out by the background, leaving it unreadable, but if your contrast is too high, the user may find your site garish and unpleasant to look at.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你有了这些颜色,你可能还需要选择合适的中性色。通常的设计实践是试图找到一个甜蜜点,即有足够的对比度,使文字清晰可读,但又不至于对比度太大,让人觉得刺眼。这很容易在某一方面走得太远,所以一旦你选择了颜色,并且有了使用的例子,一定要得到反馈。如果对比度太低,你的文字往往会被背景冲淡,让人无法阅读,但如果你的对比度太高,用户可能会觉得你的网站很华丽,不好看。

trans-unit.source: One thing the datetime-local input type doesn't provide is a way to set the time zone and/or locale of the date/time control. This was available in the datetime input type, but this type is now obsolete, having been removed from the spec. The main reasons why this was removed are a lack of implementation in browsers, and concerns over the user interface/experience. It is easier to just have a control (or controls) for setting the date/time and then deal with the locale in a separate control.
trans-unit.target: datetime-local 输入类型不提供的一件事是设置日期/时间控件的时区和/或语言环境的方法。在 datetime 输入类型中可用，但是此类型已过时，已从规范中删除。删除此代码的主要原因是浏览器缺乏实现，以及对用户界面/体验的担忧。仅具有一个（或多个）控件来设置日期/时间，然后在单独的控件中处理语言环境会更容易。

trans-unit.source: One thing to note is that the displayed date and time formats differ from the actual value; the displayed date and time are formatted according to the user's locale as reported by their operating system, whereas the date/time value is always formatted "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm". When the above value submitted to the server, for example, it will look like "partydate=2017-06-01T08:30".
trans-unit.target: 要注意的一件事是显示的日期和时间格式与实际 value 不同；所显示的日期和时间将根据其操作系统报告的用户区域设置进行格式化，而日期/时间 value 则始终采用 "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm" 格式化。例如，当上述值提交给服务器时，它将看起来像 "partydate=2017-06-01T08:30" 。

trans-unit.source: One thing to note is that the displayed date and time formats differ from the actual value; the displayed date and time are formatted according to the user's locale as reported by their operating system, whereas the date/time value is always formatted yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm. When the above value submitted to the server, for example, it will look like partydate=2017-06-01T08:30.
trans-unit.target: 要注意的一件事是，显示的日期和时间格式与实际 value 不同；所显示的日期和时间将根据其操作系统报告的用户区域设置进行格式化，而日期/时间 value 则始终采用 yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm 进行格式化。例如，当上述值提交给服务器时，它将看起来像 partydate=2017-06-01T08:30 。

trans-unit.source: One thing to note is that the displayed date format differs from the actual value — the displayed date format will be chosen based on the set locale of the user's browser, whereas the date value is always formatted yyyy-mm-dd.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的一件事是，显示的日期格式与实际 value 不同-显示的日期格式将根据用户浏览器的设置区域设置进行选择，而日期 value 始终采用 yyyy-mm-dd 格式。

trans-unit.source: One thing to note is that the displayed date format differs from the actual value; most user agents display the month and year in a locale-appropriate form, based on the set locale of the user's operating system, whereas the date value is always formatted yyyy-MM.
trans-unit.target: 要注意的一件事是显示的日期格式与实际 value 不同；大多数用户代理会根据用户操作系统的设置区域设置以适合区域设置的形式显示月份和年份，而日期 value 始终采用 yyyy-MM 格式。

trans-unit.source: One thing to note is that the displayed format may differ from the actual value, which is always formatted yyyy-Www. When the above value is submitted to the server, for example, browsers may display it as Week 01, 2017, but the submitted value will always look like week=2017-W01.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的一件事是，显示的格式可能与实际 value 有所不同，后者始终采用 yyyy-Www 格式。例如，当将上述值提交给服务器时，浏览器可能会将其显示为 Week 01, 2017 ，但是提交的值将始终看起来像 week=2017-W01 。

trans-unit.source: Optional. This subtag defines a dialect of the base language from a particular location, and is either 2 letters in ALLCAPS matching a country code, or 3 numbers matching a non-country area. For example, es-ES is for Spanish as spoken in Spain, and es-013 is Spanish as spoken in Central America. “International Spanish” would just be es.
trans-unit.target: 可选的。此子标签定义了特定位置的基本语言的方言，并且是与国家代码匹配的ALLCAPS中的2个字母，或与非国家区域匹配的3个数字。例如， es-ES 用于西班牙语，如在西班牙所说，而 es-013 是西班牙语在中美洲。“国际西班牙语”将是 es 。

trans-unit.source: Optional. This subtag defines the writing system used for the language, and is always 4 characters long, with the first letter capitalized. For example, French-in-Braille is fr-Brai and ja-Kana is Japanese written with the Katakana alphabet. If the language is written in a highly typical way, like English in the Latin alphabet, there is no need to use this subtag.
trans-unit.target: 选修的。该子标签定义了用于该语言的书写系统，并且始终为4个字符长，首字母大写。例如，Braille中的法语是 fr-Brai ,而 ja-Kana 是用片假名字母编写的日语。如果以非常典型的方式编写语言（例如拉丁字母中的英语），则无需使用此子标签。

trans-unit.source: Optional. This subtag defines the writing system used for the language, and is always 4 characters long, with the first letter capitalized. For example, French-in-Braille is fr-Brail and ja-Kana is Japanese written with the Katakana alphabet. If the language is written in a highly typical way, like English in the Latin alphabet, there is no need to use this subtag.
trans-unit.target: 可选的。该子标签定义了用于该语言的书写系统，并且始终为4个字符长，首字母大写。例如， fr-Brail 法语是fr-Brail，而 ja-Kana 是用片假名字母编写的日语。如果以非常典型的方式（例如拉丁字母中的英语）书写语言，则无需使用此子标签。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise
trans-unit.target: Otherwise

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <mark> indicates a portion of the document's content which is likely to be relevant to the user's current activity. This might be used, for example, to indicate the words that matched a search operation.
trans-unit.target: 否则， <mark> 指示文档内容的一部分，该部分可能与用户的当前活动有关。例如，这可以用于指示与搜索操作匹配的单词。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, one or more elements of metadata content where exactly one is a <title> element.
trans-unit.target: 否则，元数据内容的一个或多个元素，其中一个元素恰好是 <title> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the link defines an alternative page, of one of these types:
trans-unit.target: 否则,该链接定义了一个替代页面,属于这些类型之一。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the text content of the <dfn> element is the term being defined.
trans-unit.target: 否则， <dfn> 元素的文本内容就是所定义的术语。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the text content of the <dfn> element is the term being defined. This is shown in the first example below.
trans-unit.target: 否则， <dfn> 元素的文本内容就是所定义的术语。这在下面的第一个示例中显示。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise: flow content or phrasing content.
trans-unit.target: 否则:流程内容或短语内容。
